JSON Namespace Reference

The JSON namespace should hold all public classes/functions/enums/structs of the libJSONpp library. More...


Classes

class  unibuffer
 Tracks access either to a unicode string, or a file mapping to a unicode file. More...
class  parser_UNI
 A builder class for parsing UNICODE files. More...
class  utf8buffer
 Tracks access either to a UTF-8 string, or a file mapping to a UTF-8 file. More...
class  parser_UTF8
 A builder class for parsing UTF-8 files. More...
union  dataptr
 Used internally to manage pointers to data. You can safely ignore this. More...
class  value
 This class represents any JSON value. A value can have any of the basic JSON datatypes, as defined in datatype::dt. internal data management is handled automatically, along with character encoding conversion between UTF-8 and Unicode. More...

Namespaces

namespace  convert
 Character-set conversion functions.
namespace  datatype
 A wrapper namespace to stop the datatype enum from polluting the JSON namespace. This also helps with IDE Auto-completion somewhat.
namespace  errors
namespace  literals
 A wrapper namespace to stop the literals enum from polluting the JSON namespace. This also helps with IDE Auto-completion somewhat.
namespace  mapping_techniques
 A wrapper-namespace around the mapping_techniques::mapping_techniques enum.

Detailed Description

The JSON namespace should hold all public classes/functions/enums/structs of the libJSONpp library.
